name: Sirens
special_abilities: PLAY DURING OPPONENT'S TURN.  OPPONENT MUST ATTACK WITH A FACE DOWN DRAGON IF POSSIBLE.  IF HE CAN'T ATTACK WITH A FACE DOWN DRAGON, HE MUST REPLACE A CARD IN HIS BATTLE PHASE.
lore: Sirens live on an island near Sclla and Charybis and lure men to their death with melodious song.
